[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ admin_label=”Omar” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” max_width=”80%” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/profile-photo.jpeg” alt=”Blackhorn Ventures — Stephan Cizmar — Operating Partner” title_text=”profile photo” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”HeadShot” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Omar Smith

Senior Associate

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Bio” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Omar is a Senior Associate at Blackhorn Ventures responsible for sourcing and conducting diligence on new investments and providing advisory support to  portfolio companies. Omar joins the team after concluding his MBA at Columbia University where he led the Columbia Venture Fellows program and worked with Precursor Ventures and Comcast Ventures.
 
Omar has a background in data and analytics, having helped scale the Insights function at LinkedIn as well as serving as a consultant and advisor to several early stage companies. His extensive experience developing tools focused on workflow automation and predictive analytics led him to develop theses on the future of work and digital transformation in overlooked industries. 
 
Omar graduated from Stanford with an M.S. in Earth Systems and a B.A. in Economics. In his free time he enjoys camping/backpacking, snowboarding, seeing live music, and spending time with friends and family. He currently lives and works in New York City. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”/team/” button_text=”Back To Full Team” button_alignment=”center” admin_label=”Back to Team Button” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”24px” button_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_icon=”J||divi||400″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

 

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Footer and Social Icons” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-30px|” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”20px||20px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” border_width_top=”0.3px” border_color_top=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” border_style_top=”none” global_module=”1056″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_6,1_6,1_6″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”ds-vertical-align” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Denver” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_6_font_size=”15px” header_6_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”10px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Based in Colorado. Click here to learn why.

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Policy
